Title: Life Interrupted
Plot: Tom and Diana track down a man to a museum, and during the chase, Tom finds a mysterious lab that only he can see. Later at the office, Tom finds that all his 4400 case files are gone, and no one has ever heard of the 4400.
GuestStars: Marshall  Caplan,  Allison Warnyca,  Don MacKay,  Mark Burgess,  Richard Hendery,  Maureen Thomas,  Brooke Nevin
